CustomField.description: ID for the Product Line. This field matches the value we receive in ZP Product Lines. This ID is 1 for all base product records/tier records. This ID is the identifier of the type of add on (ex: Priority Support and HR Services).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ID for the Product Line. This field matches the value we receive in ZP Product Lines. This ID is 1 for all base product records/tier records. This ID is the identifier of the type of add on (ex: Priority Support and HR Services).
CustomField.label: Product Line ID
